Class GameLaunch

java.lang.Object
GameLaunch
public class GameLaunch
extends java.lang.Object
this class manages the whole game and all essential actions are done by this class
Version:
1.0 (30.4.2021)
Author:
mohammad-hossein zeynal zadeh

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String ANSI_RESET  
    private java.lang.String ANSI_WHITE  
    private java.lang.String ANSI_YELLOW  
    private java.util.LinkedList<Card> cardsDeck
    card deck that contains 52 cards as default.
    private int gameMode
    this field represents number of players and it must be 3, 4, or 5
    private boolean moveTurnLimitation
    if a player gives a BonusPlayCard and should have another chance to play, this boolean does the job
    private boolean pickCheck
    this boolean is used for increasing punishment of players whenever they must receive some of RandomPick4card and RandomPick2Card.
    private int pickNumberX2
    this field determines the punishment of a player whenever his previous player gives a RandomPick2Card its default amount must be zero and whenever a player uses RandomPick2Card, 1 number advances and whenever player gets his random cards it will be zero again
    private int pickNumberX4
    this field determines the punishment of a player whenever his previous player gives a RandomPick4card its default amount must be zero and whenever a player uses RandomPick4card, 1 number advances and whenever player gets his random cards it will be zero again
    private int playerMode
    1 for playing with humans and -1 for playing with bots
    private java.util.ArrayList<Player> players
    arraylist of players
    private int turn
    this field is kinda index of players arraylist and determines which player should play now if turnMode equals 1, everytime it advances 1 number and if turnMode equals -1, everytime it withdraws 1 number method moveToNextPlayer() has this duty
    private int turnMode
    this field represents the way game run 1 for clockwise and -1 for anticlockwise it can be changed by using ChangeDirectionCard

    checks if player has used BonusPlayCard or not
    boolean isPickCheck()
    checks if the player that must have been punished had put any "7 card" or not
    boolean isScoreOfPlayerZero()
    this method is condition of finishing game if cards of a player finishes, this will inform us and the game finishes
    boolean isThereAnyMatchingCard()
    checks if there is any card that matches with top card in palyer's card deck("B card" is also accepted)
    boolean isThereAnyMatchWithPunishmentCard()
    checks if player has RandomPick2Card or RandomPick4card or not
    void moveToNextPlayer()
    gives 1 number to turn if turnMode is 1 and gets 1 number from it if turnMode is -1
    void penaltyPick​(Card card)
    whenever we use RandomPick4card or RandomPick2Card this method is used and gives a mixture of these two cards to next player or let him to give a "7 card"

    lets player to play his turn
    void printOtherPlayersCardsNumber()
    prints number of cards of players except the person who is playing

    this method uses bubble sort to show rank of players used bubble sort in this methodbubble list URL reference rank #1 has the lowest card score
    void putNormalCardOnTop()
    as role of game, there must be a NormalCard on top at the beginning of game this method does the work

    void setTurn​(int turn)
    sets the amount of player's turn

  • Field Details

    • gameMode

      private int gameMode
      this field represents number of players and it must be 3, 4, or 5

    • turnMode

      private int turnMode
      this field represents the way game run 1 for clockwise and -1 for anticlockwise it can be changed by using ChangeDirectionCard

    • turn

      private int turn
      this field is kinda index of players arraylist and determines which player should play now if turnMode equals 1, everytime it advances 1 number and if turnMode equals -1, everytime it withdraws 1 number method moveToNextPlayer() has this duty

    • pickNumberX2

      private int pickNumberX2
      this field determines the punishment of a player whenever his previous player gives a RandomPick2Card its default amount must be zero and whenever a player uses RandomPick2Card, 1 number advances and whenever player gets his random cards it will be zero again

    • pickNumberX4

      private int pickNumberX4
      this field determines the punishment of a player whenever his previous player gives a RandomPick4card its default amount must be zero and whenever a player uses RandomPick4card, 1 number advances and whenever player gets his random cards it will be zero again

    • pickCheck

      private boolean pickCheck
      this boolean is used for increasing punishment of players whenever they must receive some of RandomPick4card and RandomPick2Card. if a player that must get some random cards as punishment gives another 7 card, this boolean does its work to give those random cards to next player

    • playerMode

      private int playerMode
      1 for playing with humans and -1 for playing with bots

    • moveTurnLimitation

      private boolean moveTurnLimitation
      if a player gives a BonusPlayCard and should have another chance to play, this boolean does the job

    • ANSI_RESET

      private java.lang.String ANSI_RESET

    • ANSI_YELLOW

      private java.lang.String ANSI_YELLOW

    • ANSI_WHITE

      private java.lang.String ANSI_WHITE

    • players

      private java.util.ArrayList<Player> players
      arraylist of players

    • cardsDeck

      private java.util.LinkedList<Card> cardsDeck
      card deck that contains 52 cards as default. Cards are created inside CardDeck.getDeck()

  • Constructor Details

    • GameLaunch

      public GameLaunch​(int gameMode, int playerMode)
      initializes fields of class
      Parameters:
      gameMode - a number between 3 and 5
      playerMode - 1 for playing with human and 1 for playing with bots

  • Method Details

    • isThereAnyMatchingCard

      public boolean isThereAnyMatchingCard()
      checks if there is any card that matches with top card in palyer's card deck("B card" is also accepted)
      Returns:
      true if there is and false if there isn't

    • putNormalCardOnTop

      public void putNormalCardOnTop()
      as role of game, there must be a NormalCard on top at the beginning of game this method does the work

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer()
      adds how many players that was added to gameMode

    • isPickCheck

      public boolean isPickCheck()
      checks if the player that must have been punished had put any "7 card" or not

    • doesTheCardMatches

      public boolean doesTheCardMatches​(int index)
      checks if the card player selected matches with top card or not
      Parameters:
      index - uses Player.getCardWithOutRemove(int) to return a card
      Returns:
      true if it does and false if it doesn't match

    • distributeCards

      public void distributeCards()
      this method is used at the beginning of game to give 7 random cards to each player from cardsDeck

    • isMoveTurnLimitation

      public boolean isMoveTurnLimitation()
      checks if player has used BonusPlayCard or not
      Returns:
      true if he has and false if he hasn't

    • getPlayers

      Returns:
      arraylist of players

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn​(int cardIndex)
      lets player to play his turn
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - index of a card from player's card deck

    • botPlayTurn

      public void botPlayTurn()
      it's used to let bot play its turn. It's as same as playTurn(int). Their difference is this method picks a random index, but it still must obey the roles of matching with top card

    • isThereAnyMatchWithPunishmentCard

      public boolean isThereAnyMatchWithPunishmentCard()
      checks if player has RandomPick2Card or RandomPick4card or not
      Returns:
      true if he has and false if he hasn't

    • penaltyPick

      public void penaltyPick​(Card card)
      whenever we use RandomPick4card or RandomPick2Card this method is used and gives a mixture of these two cards to next player or let him to give a "7 card"

      public Card pickCard()
      Returns:

      public void moveToNextPlayer()

      card - the card that player gives
